body.p: The lessor accounting requirements in IFRS 16 are substantially unchanged from those in IAS 17. Consequently, the IASB decided that a lessor is not required to make any adjustments on transition and should account for its leases applying IFRS 16 from the date of initial application (except for intermediate lessors in a sublease—see paragraphs BC290–BC291).
